content:
146 infrastructure facilities were also hit.

About thisreported March 21Military Media Center with reference to the information provided by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

In total during the last day, Russian troops fired the territory of 10 regions of Ukraine.

The strokes were made from different types of weapons: mortars, tanks, artillery, jet artillery, anti-aircraft missile complexes, operational-tactical missile complexes, UAVs and tactical aviation.

There are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

ArmyinformMade a photo reportThe effects of rocket stroke in the capital.
title: In the past day, Russia fired 101 Ukrainian settlement
description: This was reported on March 21 by Military Media Center with reference to information provided ...
author: Army Inform
